response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 750000}
